title: Decoding Decoding the Gurus
description:
I have the pleasure of chatting with Chris and Matt, the hosts of up and coming podcast "Decoding the Gurus". These guys are looking to make sense of prominent figures who have ganed a following over the past few years and focus on one individual in each episode.

Listen to the Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Decoding-Decoding-the-Gurus-emagmk

Listen to Decoding the Gurus here: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/decoding-the-gurus/id1531266667

follow there twitter here: @guruspod

Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
